title: Implement new indicator McGinleyDynamic

Superseed #8149 

#### Motivation and Context

#### Requires Documentation Change
<!--- Please indicate if these changes will require updates to documentation, and if so, specify what changes are required -->

comparison with talipp computation of McGinley(14) of SPY close prices using [generate_reference_data_from_talipp.py](https://github.com/QuantConnect/Lean/blob/master/Tests/TestData/generate_reference_data_from_talipp.py)
